[3004sub0] ParameterName=Number of entries ObjectType=7 DataType=5 AccessType=ro PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=6
[3004sub1] ParameterName=APP 1 Velocity Feedback Mode ObjectType=7 DataType=5 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=0 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=5 ;;Description: In case of multiple drive configuration (use of 2 or more drives in the system) entered value defines from which drive velocity is used in velocity regulator. ;; ;;0 - One drive is source for velocity (Velocity Feedback Drive Number is determinating from which drive is source for velocity) ;;1 - Minimum velocity from all drives is used ;;2 - Maximum velocity from all drives is used ;;3 - Averaged velocity from all drives is used
[3004sub2] ParameterName=APP 1 Velocity Feedback Drive Number ObjectType=7 DataType=5 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=1 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=255 ;;Description: In case of multiple drive configuration (use of 2 or more drives in the system) entered value defines from which drive velocity is used in velocity regulator. ;; ;;0 - reserved ;;1 - Drive1_NodeID ;;2 - Drive2_NodeID ;;3 - Drive3_NodeID ;;4 - Drive4_NodeID ;;5-255 - reserved
[3004sub3] ParameterName=APP 1 Velocity Regulator P ObjectType=7 DataType=6 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=5000 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=65535 ;;Description: Input to velocity regulator is desired P part units are A/user units. Regulator output is motor current demand in 1/1000 mot nominal current. ;;Note: Entered value is internaly devided by 1000.
[3004sub4] ParameterName=APP 1 Velocity Regulator I ObjectType=7 DataType=6 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=100 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=65535 ;;Not used
[3004sub5] ParameterName=APP 1 Velocity Regulator Max Drive Current ObjectType=7 DataType=7 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=1000 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=4294967295 ;;Units: 1/1000 motor rated current ;;Description: Maximum drive current

[3005sub1] ParameterName=APP 1 Brake Mode ObjectType=7 DataType=5 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=0 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=3 ;;Description: ;;0 - Disabled ;;1 - Digital only ;;2 - Linear only ;;3 - Digital and linear
[3005sub2] ParameterName=APP 1 Brake Minimum Velocity ObjectType=7 DataType=6 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=1000 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=65535 ;;Units: velocity user units ;;Description: If this function is enabled motor will brake with brake base current or brake maximum linear current (sum of both currents) when velocity is above this value. ;;If velocity is lower then this value brake current will linearly drop to 0.
[3005sub3] ParameterName=APP 1 Brake Digital Current ObjectType=7 DataType=6 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=80 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=65535 ;;Units: 1/1000 motor rated current ;;Description: If motor velocity is higher than brake minimum velocity and brake switch is enabled and active motor will brake with entered value. ;;If velocity is lower then this value brake current will linearly drop to 0.
[3005sub4] ParameterName=APP 1 Brake Linear Current ObjectType=7 DataType=6 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=100 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=65535 ;;Units: 1/1000 motor rated current ;;Description: If motor velocity is higher than brake minimum velocity and brake analog input is connected motor will brake linearly from zero to this value.
[3005sub5] ParameterName=APP 1 Brake Potentiometer Minimum Voltage ObjectType=7 DataType=6 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=1000 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=65535 ;;Units: mV ;;Description: Above entered value potentiometer output will linearly raise up, output limit (maximum linear current) will be reached at brake potentiometer maximum voltage.
[3005sub6] ParameterName=APP 1 Brake Potentiometer Maximum Voltage ObjectType=7 DataType=6 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=4000 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=65535 ;;Units: mV ;;Description: Entered value is maximum brake potentiometer output
[3005sub7] ParameterName=APP 1 Brake Current ObjectType=7 DataType=3 AccessType=ro PDOMapping=0 ;;Units: 1/1000 motor rated current ;;Description: Absolute braking current (linear + digital current)
[3005sub8] ParameterName=APP 1 Regeneration Active ObjectType=7 DataType=5 AccessType=ro PDOMapping=0 ;;0 - Regeneration not active ;;1 - Regeneration active
[3005sub9] ParameterName=APP 1 Constant Regeneration Current Enable ObjectType=7 DataType=5 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=0 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=1 ;;0 - Constant regeneration current disabled ;;1 - Constant regeneration current enabled ;; ;;Note: Function is active only if Control mode (0x3001sub01) is set to Torque mode(1)!
[3005suba] ParameterName=APP 1 Constant Regeneration Current ObjectType=7 DataType=6 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=150 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=10000 ;;Units: 1/1000 Motor rated current ;; ;;Description: If this function is enabled this value is added to current demand from potentiometer ;; ;;Note: Function is active only if Control mode (0x3001sub01) is set to Torque mode(1)!
[3005subb] ParameterName=APP 1 Constant Regeneration Minimum Velocity ObjectType=7 DataType=6 AccessType=rw PDOMapping=0 DefaultValue=1000 LowLimit=0 HighLimit=65535 ;;Units: velocity user units ;; ;;Description: Regeneration Actual Current above this value will be Constant Regeneration Current, if velocity will be lower Regeneration Actual Current will be correspondingly decreased.
[3005subc] ParameterName=APP 1 Constant Regeneration Actual Current ObjectType=7 DataType=3 AccessType=ro PDOMapping=0 ;;Units: 1/1000 motor rated current ;; ;;Description: Actual regeneration current
